product_name: NOCO XGrid 9W Foldable Solar Panel Kit
long_description: Turn up the tunes or shed light on campfire gatherings when you plug into this portable solar kit. The compact design charges quickly by sun or USB and folds neatly to pack for off-grid energy.
short_description: Turn up the tunes or shed light on campfire gatherings when you plug into this portable solar kit. The compact design charges quickly by sun or USB and folds neatly to pack for off-grid energy.
